body:
Well doujins that starts as vanilla then ends with ntr are available too.
Maybe Otono Natsu is just balancing things out.

Typical Otono Natsu tactic...bait first 2-3 pages with orgy, the rest are run-of-the-mill vanilla. I am okay with vanilla but disgust that he exploited slut/orgy fetish to sell his work but never has a gall to do it.
